resources:
WildSocksCommunity Connexion Inscription Ok Annuler MainActivity Pas encore de compte? Inscris-toi ici! Créer mon profil Complétez tes informations pour créer ton compte Pseudo Email Mot de Passe Ta Pointure? Quelle est ta devise? Ajoute ta photo de profil! Bienvenue! Connecte-toi: Merci de compléter le Pseudo, l\'Email et le mot de passe Merci d\'indiquer un mot de passe Merci de compléter ton Email Merci d\'indiquer ton Email et Mot de passe Bienvenue Bienvenue Bienvenue Identification en cours... Enregistrement en cours Déjà inscrit? Connectes-toi ici! Problème lors de la création de compte! Album Camera Légende? Ajoute une nouvelle photo ! Enregistrer
//Sock Activity Legend Noter Tu ne peux pas noter 0!
// Modify Profil Modifier la photo de profil MODIFIER Supprimer ton compte Modifier le profil Mot de passe oublié ?
// Modify Password
Vous ne vous rappelez plus de votre mot de passe ? Indiquez- nous votre email, pour générer un nouveau mot de passe. Envoyer Le message a été envoyé ! Succès ! Erreur ! Es-tu sûr d\'avoir un compte à cette adresse email ? Tu dois renseigner une adresse email !
// Modify My Socks Légende Terminé
Hello blank fragment
//Dialog box delete Supprimer? Es-tu certain de vouloir supprimer?
//Dialog box un-kick
Sortir de tes kicks? Annuler Retirer mon kick! retirer kick Modifier mon mot de passe Le téléchargement a échoué ! Légende :
//Dialog box category Choisi la catégorie de ta photo : Chaussettes Chaussons Classement général Chaussons Chaussette Tongs
//Comment Activity Ajouter un commentaire Poster Tu n\'as pas entré de commentaire Es-tu certain de vouloir supprimer ce commentaire? Yeah ! Peux-tu en dire un peu plus ! Ton commentaire ... Woah! Merci pour ta note ! Kick Up cette photo ! Tu n\'as pas le droit de supprimer ce commentaire! Pointure
//AlertDialogs Signaler une photo Cette publication est inappropriée ? Non Oui ok Merci de l\'info ! Tu changes de Chaussettes ? Es tu sûr de vouloir supprimer ta photo ? TOP Moderator!!! Ok, On garde Chérie ça va trancher
J\'ai lu et j\'accepte les conditions générales d\'utilisation.
Tu dois accepter les conditions générales d\'utilisation ! Terms of Use
The Service is owned or controlled by the Wild Code School ("WCS"). It is the outcome of a development project of three WCS students based in Toulouse Antoine Biamouret Marion Fontaine Robin Goudy
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or the Service, please contact the WCS(https://wildcodeschool.fr/).
Community Guidelines
Post only your own photos and always follow the law.
Respect everyone on Wild Socks Community, don’t spam people or post nudity.
Share only photos that you’ve taken or have the right to share.
Post photos and videos that are appropriate for a diverse audience.
Follow the law.
Respect other members of the Wild Socks Community.
Maintain our supportive environment by not glorifying self-injury.
Privacy Policy 1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT Your username, password and e-mail address when you create your account. Profile information that you provide for your user profile (e.g., avatar picture and foot size). User Content (e.g., photos, comments) that you post to the Service. Communications between you and Wild Socks Community. For example, we may send you Service-related emails (e.g., account verification, changes/updates to features of the Service, technical and security notices). 2. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION In addition to some of the specific uses of information we describe in this Privacy Policy, we may use information that we receive to: remember information so you will not have to re-enter it during your visit or the next time you visit the Service; 3. SHARING OF YOUR INFORMATION We will not rent or sell your information to third parties.
Terms of Use
You must be at least 16 years old to use the Service You may not post violent, nude, partially nude, discriminatory, unlawful, infringing, hateful, pornographic or sexually suggestive photos or other content via the Service. You are responsible for any activity that occurs through your account You agree that you will not solicit, collect or use the login credentials of other Instagram users. You are responsible for keeping your password secret and secure. You must not defame, stalk, bully, abuse, harass, threaten, impersonate or intimidate people or entities and you must not post private or confidential information via the Service. You may not use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You agree to comply with all laws, rules and regulations applicable to your use of the Service and your Content, including but not limited to, copyright laws. You are solely responsible for your conduct and any content or materials (collectively, "Content") that you submit, post or display on or via the Service. You must not change, modify, adapt or alter the Service or change, modify or alter another website so as to falsely imply that it is associated with the Service or the Wild Code School. You must not access Wild Socks Community private API by means other than those permitted by Wcs. You must not create or submit unwanted email, comments, likes or other forms of commercial or harassing communications (a/k/a "spam") to any Wild Socks Community users. You must not interfere or disrupt the Service or servers or networks connected to the Service, including by transmitting any worms, viruses, spyware, malware or any other code of a destructive or disruptive nature. You must comply with Wild Socks Community Guidelines, available below (see Community Guidelines). Violation of these Terms of Use may, in WCS’ sole discretion, result in termination of your Wild Socks Community account or suppression of any Content you might have posted on Wild Socks Community. You understand and agree that WCS cannot and will not be responsible for the Content posted on the Service and you use the Service at your own risk. If you violate the letter or spirit of these Terms of Use, or otherwise create risk or possible legal exposure for WCS, we can stop providing the Service to you.
General Conditions
We reserve the right to modify or terminate the Service or your access to the Service for any reason, without notice, at any time, and without liability to you. You can deactivate your Wild Socks Community account by logging into the Service and requesting the destruction of your account. Your photos, comments, kicks and all other data will no longer be accessible through your account (e.g., users will not be able to navigate to your socks). Those materials and data may persist and appear within the Service (e.g., if your Content has been kicked by others : they will keep it in their personnal « MyKicks » view). We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to change these Terms of Use ("Updated Terms") from time to time. You agree that we may notify you of the Updated Terms by posting them on the Service, and that your use of the Service after the effective date of the Updated Terms constitutes your agreement to the Updated Terms. We reserve the right to refuse access to the Service to anyone for any reason at any time. We may, but have no obligation to, remove, edit, block, and/or monitor Content or accounts containing Content that we determine in our sole discretion violates these Terms of Use. Rights 7 WCS does not claim ownership of any Content that you post on or through the Service. Instead, you hereby grant to WCS a non-exclusive, fully paid and royalty-free, transferable, sub-licensable, worldwide license to use the Content that you post on or through the Service. The Service contains content owned or licensed by WCS ("WCS Content"). WCS Content is protected by copyright,you will not reproduce, modify, adapt, prepare derivative works based on, perform, display, publish, distribute, transmit, broadcast, sell, license or otherwise exploit the WCS Content. Although it is WCS’s intention for the Service to be available as much as possible, there will be occasions when the Service may be interrupted. Also, WCS reserves the right to remove any Content from the Service for any reason, without prior notice. WCS will not be liable to you for any modification, suspension, or discontinuation of the Services, or the loss of any Content. You agree that WCS is not responsible for, and does not endorse, Content posted within the Service. WCS does not have any obligation to prescreen, monitor, edit, or remove any Content. If your Content violates these Terms of Use, you may bear legal responsibility for that Content. Any Content will be non-confidential and non-proprietary and we will not be liable for any use or disclosure of Content. Contact : Wild Code School Toulouse - Justine Lacousse - justine@wildcodeschool.fr April, 24 of 2017 Merci d\'indiquer ta pointure Tu dois accepter les conditions générales d\'utilisation.
